org.doctag.domain

Class Amount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctag.domain.Amount

  • public class Amount
extends Object
    Representation of a monetary amount in a docTag document.
    Author:
    Jochen Schalanda
    See Also:
    "docTag specification 0.5, section 2.2.4"
